@clcgio @MarketHoneycomb @chainlink Disaster Risk Insurance is a micro-insurance contract for hedging against the risk of natural disasters in the real world  Any users who fund premiums and match conditions can receive insurance payouts instantly by a Chainlinked Smart Contract connected to an ipStack API  https://t.co/9Vcim070dO

@clcgio @MarketHoneycomb @chainlink Oracle Crops Insurance is a digital platform wherein crop insurance policies are plugged into smart contracts and indexed to local weather  During an extreme weather event, policies are automatically triggered, which facilitates fair, transparent and timely payouts  https://t.co/4IqugDrOfn
